title: Is black or blue ink better for memorisation and studying in general? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ve done my research on this found: Green helps with concentration. Orange helps with motivation and productivity. Blue helps with productivity and creativity too. Red helps with creativity and memory. Overall it mostly has to do with what stimulates your brain and helps you the most. Here are my links to my research if you're curious. The Psychology of Color: How Do Colors Influence Learning? Color Study Looks at Effects of Red and Blue

In my opinion, blue ink is better for studying and memorizing and is more for students whereas black is used for professional business or for signing official documents or filling out government forms and applications. If you are a student, go with blue ink.
